divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading home from work on state rd. 64 in Indiana heading west at around 10:20 pm. I saw what i thought was a flare i told my wife i needed to get off the phone.It was about 100ft off the ground looked perfectly round and had white center with a red glow surrounding it.I managed to get 2 pics with my cellphone the first one was really blurry from the sleet rain hitting the windshield of my car.I rolled down the window of my car and started to lean out the window for a 3 picture and the red glow literaly in matter of seconds peeled away starting at the bottom going around the white center to the top and formed sort of candle shape dropped a couple feet and took off to my left heading towards Crandal Indiana.
Summary: Driving home from work and saw a white orb with red glow hovering off the ground about a 100 feet the red glow disapeared dropped a couple of feet and headed south.
